name: Sea Star Crossed Lovers
description:
“I’ll make my way to you… I swear it.”

Sea Star Crossed Lovers is about two girls, Astra the celestial being and Noelani the ocean nymph, who are separated by the earth's atmosphere. Noelani decides she want to reach her soulmate anyways, and must tower up from her home shoreline with tetrominoes despite the wind and the relentless waves.

In this game, you witness Astra and Noelani's plight through interactive visual novel-style sequences, and help Noelani breach the heavens by stacking a tower of physics-based tetromino blocks. Can you see their wishes fulfilled?

Made by the UC Santa Cruz Game Design and Art Collaboration Club, 2020-2021 school year. Download the game to see a full list of credits!
